{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the information provided in the documents, a condylar fracture that leads to disruption of the temporomandibular joint (TMJ) anteriorly would be classified as a complex fracture. Complex fractures involve multiple fragments and can result in displacement or dislocation of the fractured bone segments. In this case, the condylar fracture disrupts the TMJ anteriorly, indicating a more complex fracture pattern.", "answer_choice": "C. Complex fracture"}
